Text: Enron Cost of Capital Tim Despain asked me to forward this information to you as part of the effort to establish Enrons cost of capital If you need any additional information or clarification feel free to give me a call at x CF

Counterparty name changedont know if Enron has any ISDAs with Sumitomo or Sakura but I thought Id forward this to you just in case Forwarded by Clint FreelandCorpEnron on AM AM To cc Subject Counterparty name change As a result of yesterdays merger between Sumitomo and Sakura Bank our main dealing counterparty Sumitomo Bank Capital Markets Inc has been renamed to SMBC Capital Markets Inc The credit rating is unchanged Regards Peter Fink

Enron PATS Cc Sorry for getting this to you late but we didnt get this until Friday afternoon and for some reason it did not make it out to the team on Friday I do not know when we will be receiving the rest of the documents Please provide us with whatever comments you can at our meeting at on Monday CF Forwarded by Clint FreelandCorpEnron on AM on PM To cc Subject Enron PATS In connection with the proposed offering of Enrons PATS were attaching a Cover Letter the Preliminary Offering Circular and the Closing Document List Best regards Hazel Mukuna See attached file Cover Letterdoc See attached file Preliminary Offering Circulardoc See attached file Closing Document Listdoc This message together with any attachments is intended only for the use of the individual or entity to which it is addressed and may contain information that is legally privileged confidential and exempt from disclosure If you are not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this messageor any attachment is strictly prohibited If you have received this message in error please notify the original sender or the WSPR Help Desk immediately by telephone or by return Email and delete the message along with any attachments from your computer Thank you Cover Letterdoc Preliminary Offering Circulardoc Closing Document Listdoc

SWAP Termsis a cleaned up term sheet from Merrill Lynch Forwarded by Clint FreelandCorpEnron on AM Barna Peter Equity Capital Markets on AM To cc Subject SWAP Terms ENETRRSwaptosigndoc Clint Attached is a clean term sheet We have NOT changed any terms just cleaned up the language Give me a call when you get a chance Thanks ENETRRSwaptosigndoc

Enron PATS Cc the wrong file was sent out earlier Here are the revised documents Please review and provide me with your comments CF Forwarded by Clint FreelandCorpEnron on PM on AM To cc Subject Enron PATS In connection with Enrons PATS offering were attaching a Cover Letter and clean and marked drafts of the revised Preliminary Offering Circular Purchase Agreement Remarketing Agreement and Trust Agreement Best regards Hazel Mukuna See attached file Cover Letterdoc See attached file Preliminary Offering Circulardoc See attached file Preliminary Offering CircularREDLINEdoc See attached file Purchase Agreementdoc See attached file Purchase AgreementREDLINEdoc See attached file Remarketing Agreementdoc See attached file Remarketing AgreementREDLINEdoc See attached file Trust Agreementdoc See attached file Trust AgreementREDLINEdoc This message together with any attachments is intended only for the use of the individual or entity to which it is addressed and may contain information that is legally privileged confidential and exempt from disclosure If you are not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this messageor any attachment is strictly prohibited If you have received this message in error please notify the original sender or the WSPR Help Desk immediately by telephone or by return Email and delete the message along with any attachments from your computer Thank you Cover Letterdoc Preliminary Offering Circulardoc Preliminary Offering CircularREDLINEdoc Purchase Agreementdoc Purchase AgreementREDLINEdoc Remarketing Agreementdoc Remarketing AgreementREDLINEdoc Trust Agreementdoc Trust AgreementREDLINEdoc

Update on Sterling PATs Cc Just a quick update on where we are with the Sterling PAT financing We got final word yesterday that Arthur Anderson would not give us the accounting treatment we needed for the transaction so we are currently looking at a couple of modifications to the structure that may address their concerns Ill keep you posted on our progress but at this point there is not much the team aside from me and the accountants needs to do CF

Re Enron Corp derivatives tradinghave meetings at and today Otherwise Im available to meet CF From Sara CT on AM To Rex nron Jim NRON Clint nron Jeff CT cc Subject Enron Corp derivatives trading All Attached is a short recap of the items which I have been discussing with Clint and Jeff Id like to get together sometime today or tomorrow Rex and Jim I will fax to you copies of the Enron Corp resolutions some final some draft only referenced in the attached summary I may not have the latest information and perhaps you can update and address when we meet Please call me with a suggested time This afternoon is best for me

Re SWAP Terms Cc I spoke with John Greene about this issue this morning and he said that he would handle it It is not customary to sign term sheets I put Peter Barna Merrill Lynch in direct contact with John with the understanding that they would work out the details including the signature I asked them to forward the confirmation to us when it was ready So in short there shouldnt be anything that we need to do on this CF Enron Global Finance From Jeff Nogid ECT PM To Clint nron cc Subject SWAP Terms Forwarded by Jeff NogidHOUECT on PM Enron Global Finance From Jeff Nogid PM To Sara CT cc Laurel CT Subject SWAP Terms Forwarded by Jeff NogidHOUECT on PM Laurel Adams AM To Jeff CT Jo CT Jill CT cc Subject SWAP Terms Who in Corporate Legal would be the correct person to initial this document Or would it be the Corp trader Jeff you may be able to sign off your agreement with the termsIm not sure that they are looking for a legally authorized signatory but as I have no idea what Corp intended to trade Im thinking you dont want me signing it Please advise ASAP Forwarded by Laurel AdamsHOUECT on AM Enron North America Corp From Selena Reyes AM To Laurel CT cc Subject SWAP Terms Laurel Attached is a term sheet from Merrill Lynch on ENE stock that we traded yesterday in swap on behalf of Corp ML is requesting that someone sign the term sheet Can you forward this to legal and find out who would be the right person to sign the term sheet I think it may be of an urgent matter bc we are trading with them today Keep me posted Thanks Selena Forwarded by Selena ReyesHOUECT on AM Barna Peter Equity Capital Markets on PM To cc Maanavi Dariush CICGGEDNY Lyons Maureen CICGGELPNY Subject SWAP Terms ENETRRSwaplegaldoc ENEswapxls John Attached is a termsheet and execution summary for the ENE swap entered into today If we dont get to mm shares by Friday we are happy to tranche the swap based on the number of shares executed at that time Please give me a call if you have any questions or comments We will give you a call in the morning to discuss if you would like us to continue our hedging activity Thank you ENETRRSwaplegaldoc ENEswapxls

Procedure memo for equity trades I put together a first draft of a procedure memo for executing equity derivatives on Enron common stock Please review this and give me any comments you might have I would appreciate it if I could have comments back from you by Friday morning so that we can have a working document as soon as possible Thanks in advance for your help CF

SWAP Termsterm sheet looks fine to me CF Forwarded by Clint FreelandCorpEnron on AM Aneela CT PM To Jeff CT Clint nron Jo CT cc Subject SWAP Terms To cc Maanavi Dariush CICGGEDNY Lyons Maureen CICGGELPNY Subject SWAP Terms ENETRRSwaplegaldoc ENEswapxls John Attached is a termsheet and execution summary for the ENE swap entered into today If we dont get to mm shares by Friday we are happy to tranche the swap based on the number of shares executed at that time Please give me a call if you have any questions or comments We will give you a call in the morning to discuss if you would like us to continue our hedging activity Thank you ENETRRSwaplegaldoc ENEswapxls

Bear Stears confirmsthe swap and termination confirms look fine to me The only question I would have for you in on the swap confirm On page there is a transfer provision at the bottom of the page I dont know what the transfer provision in Section of the Master Agreement is but I just want to be sure that this does not allow them to freely transfer their obligations under the agreement to a nonaffiliate I know that the trade has been terminated but I just dont want any bad precedents being set This language may be just fine I just wanted to be sure Otherwise it looks good to me CF

Re Term Sheetfinal Forwarded by Clint FreelandCorpEnron on PM Clint Freeland PM To Jim NRON cc Subject Re Term Sheetfinal Jim Have we received the signed version from them Do we need to sign it as well Where does this deal stand I havent seenheard anything since we last spoke with CSFB Have you seen a confirmation for the amendment to a swap Please let me know CF From Jim Armogida on PM To Clint nron cc Subject Term Sheetfinal Clintthe term sheet below is the final It has received all approvals necessary at CSFBi They are going to send us the signed version on Monday the delay simply because it will come from London but it is all done and we can count on it as a final deal Forwarded by Jim ArmogidaCorpEnron on PM Emerson Michael AM To cc Subject Term Sheet ENRONTermSheetdoc

Form of forward contract from Lehman I received a fax from Lehman yesterday with a form of forward confirmation that they believe meets and requirements This isnt for any trade that weve done with them but just an example of something that they think works I will send copies of this to each of you Please review this and let me know your thoughts CF

Re meeting with Bob Bairdseems like that is the best way to go With the board resolution well just need to drag our feet a little on signing the ISDA We should go ahead and negotiate the document and be ready to close right after we get the resolution in October Thanks for the update CF From Sara CT on PM To Clint nron cc Subject meeting with Bob Baird Clint after the meeting Jim advised me that the ENE board resolution will be drafted for the Oct meeting In the interim he is convinced that only Enron Corp should be a swap party to these equity swaps forwards etc I am going to speak with Rod Nelson credit and make some changes to our approach This should also make life easier negotiating with Lehman and Bear from a credit perspecttive but well reach an obvious stalemate when they ask for an Enron Corp resolution forthcoming after the relevant board meeting Sara
RE Enron unwind and forward trade details Cc Here is a summary of the terms of the CSFB swap that we unwound on Friday and replaced with a forward CF ENRONxls

Enron Term Sheet DRAFTand Jim Here is the term sheet for the CSFB forward this is related to the swap that we unwound on Friday The same old issues of registration and net cash settlement are in here Id also like to talk to yall about the fees and expenses section Jim where are we on putting together registration language that is acceptable to us Talk to yall later CF Forwarded by Clint FreelandCorpEnron on AM Chai Thomas on PM To cc Roth Jason Tom Gabriel Moran James Haratunian Stephen Subject Enron Term Sheet DRAFT Clint Please find an attached draft copy of the term sheet pertaining to the Enron Equity Forward transaction executed on August Please review the terms and conditions tommorrow morning and to the extent you are in agreement we will obtain the necessary signatures and move towards execution copies over the next few days If you have questions please give me a call Best Regards Aug FWD Term Sheet IIIdoc Tom This message is for the named persons use LSU football scheduleI forgot to send this to you on Friday Here it is September nd Westerm Carolina Baton Rouge th Univ of Houston Baton Rouge th Auburn Auburn Ala rd AlaBirmingham Baton Rouge th Tennessee Baton Rouge October th Florida Gainesville Fla th Kentucky Baton Rouge st Mississippi State Baton Rouge th Open Date November th Alabama Baton Rouge th Ole Miss Oxford Miss th Open Date th Arkansas Little Rock Ark Friday game

Re Enron Term Sheet DRAFT Cc Jim CF From Jim Armogida on AM To Clint nron cc Sara CT Subject Re Enron Term Sheet DRAFT Yes It is almost finished and I should have it out in a few minutes Clint Freeland AM To Sara CT Jim NRON cc Subject Enron Term Sheet DRAFT Sara and Jim Here is the term sheet for the CSFB forward this is related to the swap that we unwound on Friday The same old issues of registration and net cash settlement are in here Id also like to talk to yall about the fees and expenses section Jim where are we on putting together registration language that is acceptable to us Talk to yall later CF Forwarded by Clint FreelandCorpEnron on AM Chai Thomas on PM To cc Roth Jason Tom Gabriel Moran James Haratunian Stephen Subject Enron Term Sheet DRAFT Clint Please find an attached draft copy of the term sheet pertaining to the Enron Equity Forward transaction executed on August Please review the terms and conditions tommorrow morning and to the extent you are in agreement we will obtain the necessary signatures and move towards execution copies over the next few days If you have questions please give me a call Best Regards Aug FWD Term Sheet IIIdoc Tom This Registration Statement LanguageForwarded by Clint FreelandCorpEnron on PM Rosica Paul on PM To cc Subject Registration Statement Language Clint We are generally ok with the language you sent over earlier today However we would like to make a couple of modifications I have attached a marked up copy of the document for your review Let me know what you think Thanks Paul Reg statement languagedoc Paul S Rosica Lehman Brothers Phone Fax This message is intended only for the personal and confidential use of the designated recipients named above If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any review dissemination distribution or copying of this message is strictly prohibited This communication is for information purposes only and should not be regarded as an offer to sell or as a solicitation of an offer to buy any financial product an official confirmation of any transaction or as an official statement of Lehman Brothers Inc its subsidiaries or affiliates Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree Therefore we do not represent that this information is complete or accurate and it should not be relied upon as such All information is subject to change without notice Reg statement languagedoc

Issuer Forwardis a draft forward confirm from Lehman It should incorporate the registration rights language we want as well as the most recent accounting language that is needed Please review and give me your comments If we are happy with this then we should move forward with an ISDA with these guys Thanks in advance for your comments CF Forwarded by Clint FreelandCorpEnron on AM Franz Philip PM To cc Subject Issuer Forward At Paul Rosicas request I have enclosed an Issuer Forward confirm for your review ENRONforwarddoc Regards Phil Phil Franz Transaction ManagementEquity Derivatives Lehman Brothers This message is intended only for the personal and confidential use of the designated recipients named above If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any review dissemination distribution or copying of this message is strictly prohibited This communication is for information purposes only and should not be regarded as an offer to sell or as a solicitation of an offer to buy any financial product an official confirmation of any transaction or as an official statement of Lehman Brothers Inc its subsidiaries or affiliates Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree Therefore we do not represent that this information is complete or accurate and it should not be relied upon as such All information is subject to change without notice ENRONforwarddoc

Equity derivative resolution Just a short note to let you know that the resolution authorizing equity derivative trades was passed by the board last week Jim Armogida just confirmed this to me So moving forward Enron Corp not ENA should be the counterparty in all of our trades As a result we should move forward with negotiating an ISDA with Lehman and others ASAP CF

Re CSFB Cc it was in their court to get us a revised confirm If so you may want to give them a call and find out where the updated confirm is CF Sara CT PM To Clint nron Jim NRON cc Subject CSFB My notes reflect that we last spoke with CSFB on I do not have a revised confirm much less a signed confirm in my files Sara

FW Enron Corp Forward Transaction Draft Confirmation Cc this friday afternoon Let me know what you think CF Forwarded by Clint FreelandCorpEnron on AM Skinner Mark PM To Clint Freeland Email cc Subject FW Enron Corp Forward Transaction Draft Confirmation Mr Freeland The message below was returned to me marked undelivered I am attempting a resend I apologise if it comes through as a duplication Regards Mark Skinner Original Message From Skinner Mark Sent Friday October PM To Jim Armogida Email Clint Freeland Email Cc Haratunian Stephen Emerson Michael Chiodi Maria Subject Enron Corp Forward Transaction Draft Confirmation Dear Mr Armogida and Mr Freeland Further to your recent discussions with my colleague Stephen Haratunian please now find attached herewith a draft Confirmation in respect of the Forward Transaction between CSFBi and Enron Corp Fwddoc We look forward to discussing this draft with you further Regards Mark Skinner Email Vice President and Counsel CREDIT FIRST TEL SUISSE BOSTON FAX Credit Suisse First Boston Corporation Madison Avenue New York NY This message is for the named persons use only It may contain confidential proprietary or legally RE Assignment language Cc Thanks for the note and apologies for this dragging out as long as it has It is clearly our intention to transition the swap into a forward dated I believe August th in the very near future and would ask that Merrill Lynch hold on to all payments due to Enron until that time Either Sara Shackleton or I will call you tomorrow Regards CF Barna Peter CICG Equity Linked Capital Markets PM To cc Subject RE Assignment language Hey Clint I was talking to some folks in Trading and Risk Mgmt who are concerned that we are sitting on swap payments that technically should have been paid to you Can you send us a short letter notifying us of your intention to complete the transition to a forward and for us to hold onto the interest payments until such time Thanks and sorry for the inconvienience Original Message From SMTP Sent Tuesday October AM To Subject Assignment language Peter Sara is looking at the assignment language right now we got it yesterday Once she has reviewed it Ill forward it to you CF

Re Enron ForwardAssignment confirmsthat is what we agreed to CF Sara CT AM To Clint nron Ryan NRON Jim NRON cc Subject Enron ForwardAssignment confirms Clint Please verify cap of Price Trigger Event occuring at USD for consecutive Exchange Business Days and Spread of from through and from through Ryan Check my voice mail about revising your language to add in bankruptcy or in liquidation Forwarded by Sara ShackletonHOUECT on AM Franz Philip AM To cc Rosica Paul Karna Angie Franz Philip Subject Enron ForwardAssignment confirms Sara and Clint For your review per Paul ENAENEAssignmentdoc Enronforwarddoc ENRONMLAssignmentdoc Regards Phil Phil Franz Transaction ManagementEquity Derivatives Lehman Brothers This message is intended only for the personal and confidential use of the designated recipients named above If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any review dissemination distribution or copying of this message is strictly prohibited This communication is for information purposes only and should not be regarded as an offer to sell or as a solicitation of an offer to buy any financial product an official confirmation of any transaction or as an official statement of Lehman Brothers Inc its subsidiaries or affiliates Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree Therefore we do not represent that this information is complete or accurate and it should not be relied upon as such All information is subject to change without notice ENAENEAssignmentdoc Enronforwarddoc ENRONMLAssignmentdoc

revision of price trigger and share cap Cc This should also have the effect of reducing the trigger on the UBS forward back down to If anyone would like to talk about this further let me know CF Forwarded by Clint FreelandCorpEnron on PM Hackmann Russell PM To Clinton Freeland Email cc Cipriano Paul Fleming Matthew Subject revision of price trigger and share cap Clint As discussed effective immediately we are revising the price trigger on the forward tranche of shares from to In return the share cap is being revised from to We will send out amendments to document this change shortly Thank you Russell F Hackmann CFA Corporate Equity Derivatives Lehman Brothers Inc fax This message is intended only for the personal and confidential use of the designated recipients named above If RE document listThis looks great Ill see if I can get someone to come up and copy this stuff for me What is your office number CF Original Message From Shackleton Sara Sent Friday January PM To Freeland Clint Subject document list File Open Positions ssdoc Sara Shackleton Enron Wholesale Services Smith Street EBa Houston TX Ph Fax

FW Promissory noteThis is what I sent to Russ Original Message From Freeland Clint Sent Tuesday November AM To Hackmann Russell Subject RE Promissory note Russ I spoke with Dave Bizer a few minutes ago and he said that you guys were still going to send the shares to us today even though nothing will happen with the fee and the note until Friday I understand from Tim that he and Skip agreed that you guys would keep the shares and wed deal with everything on Friday So why dont you guys just hold on to the shares and we will settle the entire trade all at once on Friday I think that would be the easiest and cleanest way to deal with this Talk to you soon CF

Estimate of Equity Forward Repurchases Cc Rex Here is an estimate of the equity forwards that wed like to repurchase over the next couple of months The dates will probably be a little different but this should give you an idea as to the timing and sequencing If you need anything else feel free to give me a call CF

RE Equity Forward Contract Cc Christine Sara is out of the office for the rest of the week but I understand why you guys have trouble with me specifically being listed Instead of my number being put in there can we just use the general Enron Corp phone number and have UBS ask to be connected to the Treasurers office There will always be a person there to take the call and you will always be directed to the right person regardless of what employee reassignments may occur between now and then Jim what do you think of this Christine since Sara is out would you please include Jim Armogida on the distribution list Thanks CF Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday September AM To Shackleton Sara Cc Freeland Clint Nogid Jeff Subject Equity Forward Contract Sara Thank you for reviewing and returning the equity forward confirmations so promptly We have reviewed the handwritten comment on page of the contract and unfortunately cannot accept the language as presented Our concern is that if we are unable to get through to Clint for any reason either speaking to him directly or getting voice mail the termination notice would not be effective We propose to insert the following language instead Such NonAffected Party will use commercially reasonable efforts to promptly confirm the transmission of such facsimile notice by telephone telephone number to the Affected Party provided however that failure to so confirm will not in anyway invalidate the effectiveness of a notice by facsimile transmission insert as the last sentence of the third paragraph under Additional Termination Event Please let me know if this works for you If so we will produce new contracts with the language and send it back to you for another round of signatures Please call me if you have any questions I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause Regards Christine Visit our website at This message contains confidential information and is intended only for the individual named If you are not the named addressee you should not disseminate distribute or copy this email Please notify the sender immediately by email if you have received this email by mistake and delete this email from your system Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree as information could be intercepted corrupted lost destroyed arrive late or incomplete or contain viruses The sender therefore does not accept liability for any errors or omissions in the contents of this message which arise as a result of email transmission If verification is required please request a hardcopy version This message is provided for informational purposes and should not be construed as a solicitation or offer to buy or sell any securities or related financial instruments

RE Equity Forward Contract Cc From a commercial perspective this is fine with me I leave it to Jim to confirm that this is acceptable from the legal perspective CF Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday September PM To Freeland Clint Cc Nogid Jeff Shackleton Sara Armogida Jim Subject RE Equity Forward Contract Clint Jim Have amended the number and added a reference to the Treasury office Such NonAffected Party will use commercially reasonable efforts to promptly confirm the transmission of such facsimile notice by telephone telephone number attention Enron Treasury Office to the Affected Party provided however that failure to so confirm will not in anyway invalidate the effectiveness of a notice by facsimile transmission Please confirm this is now acceptable Any questions dont hesitate to contact me Regards Annette Spencer Reply Separator Subject RE Equity Forward Contract Author ClintFreeland Clint NRONcom at unixmime Date AM Christine Sara is out of the office for the rest of the week but I understand why you guys have trouble with me specifically being listed Instead of my number being put in there can we just use the general Enron Corp phone number and have UBS ask to be connected to the Treasurers office There will always be a person there to take the call and you will always be directed to the right person regardless of what employee reassignments may occur between now and then Jim what do you think of this Christine since Sara is out would you please include Jim Armogida on the distribution list Thanks CF Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday September AM To Shackleton Sara Cc Freeland Clint Nogid Jeff Subject Equity Forward Contract Sara Thank you for reviewing and returning the equity forward confirmations so promptly We have reviewed the handwritten comment on page of the contract and unfortunately cannot accept the language as presented Our concern is that if we are unable to get through to Clint for any reason either speaking to him directly or getting voice mail the termination notice would not be effective We propose to insert the following language instead Such NonAffected Party will use commercially reasonable efforts to promptly confirm the transmission of such facsimile notice by telephone telephone number to the Affected Party provided however that failure to so confirm will not in anyway invalidate the effectiveness of a notice by facsimile transmission insert as the last sentence of the third paragraph under Additional Termination Event Please let me know if this works for you If so we will produce new contracts with the language and send it back to you for another round of signatures Please call me if you have any questions I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause Regards Christine RE Revised Total Retun ConfirmationWe provided CSFB puts just like Lehman We did that the last time we had to move the trigger price since our stock price was declining As a result of us giving them puts they took the trigger price out which means that we dont have to renegotiate the confirms every time our stock heads south Jeff would you please get the details of the puts to Sara Thanks CF Original Message From Shackleton Sara Sent Tuesday October PM To Freeland Clint Nogid Jeff Subject FW Revised Total Retun Confirmation Per my voice mail Original Message From Emerson Michael ENRON Sent Tuesday October AM To Shackleton Sara Cc Haratunian Stephen Subject RE Revised Total Retun Confirmation Sara We will prepare execution copies of the confirmations for the various transactions and send them to you Before we do that though do you know the status of the puts Shackleton Sara I never heard mention of the puts Regards Mike Original Message From Shackleton Sara mailtoSara NRONcom Sent Tuesday October AM To Chiodi Maria ENRON Armogida Jim Cc Emerson Michael Haratunian Stephen Armogida Jim Subject RE Revised Total Retun Confirmation Maria and Michael The form of confirmation of fine How would you like to handle execution of this transaction of remaining transactions Scheduling the VE discussion for later this week is also acceptable We look forward to hearing from you Regards Sara Shackleton Enron Wholesale Services Smith Street EBa Houston TX Ph Fax Original Message From Chiodi Maria ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESChiodiCMariaCmariaEchiodicsfb EcomE NRONcom Sent Thursday October PM To Armogida Jim Shackleton Sara Cc Emerson Michael Haratunian Stephen Subject Revised Total Retun Confirmation Jim and Sara As we discussed I attach a revised copy of the confirmation that is marked to show changes made to our June th draft Regards Maria Chiodi Legal and Compliance Department CREDIT FIRST SUISSE BOSTON Phone Fax TRS Oct CSFB Draftdoc This message is for the named RE Enron unwind and forward trade details Cc Here is a summary of the terms of the CSFB swap that we unwound on Friday and replaced with a forward CF ENRONxls

Re meeting with Bob Bairdseems like that is the best way to go With the board resolution well just need to drag our feet a little on signing the ISDA We should go ahead and negotiate the document and be ready to close right after we get the resolution in October Thanks for the update CF From Sara CT on PM To Clint nron cc Subject meeting with Bob Baird Clint after the meeting Jim advised me that the ENE board resolution will be drafted for the Oct meeting In the interim he is convinced that only Enron Corp should be a swap party to these equity swaps forwards etc I am going to speak with Rod Nelson credit and make some changes to our approach This should also make life easier negotiating with Lehman and Bear from a credit perspecttive but well reach an obvious stalemate when they ask for an Enron Corp resolution forthcoming after the relevant board meeting Sara

Form of forward contract from Lehman I received a fax from Lehman yesterday with a form of forward confirmation that they believe meets and requirements This isnt for any trade that weve done with them but just an example of something that they think works I will send copies of this to each of you Please review this and let me know your thoughts CF

Re Term Sheetfinal Forwarded by Clint FreelandCorpEnron on PM Clint Freeland PM To Jim NRON cc Subject Re Term Sheetfinal Jim Have we received the signed version from them Do we need to sign it as well Where does this deal stand I havent seenheard anything since we last spoke with CSFB Have you seen a confirmation for the amendment to a swap Please let me know CF From Jim Armogida on PM To Clint nron cc Subject Term Sheetfinal Clintthe term sheet below is the final It has received all approvals necessary at CSFBi They are going to send us the signed version on Monday the delay simply because it will come from London but it is all done and we can count on it as a final deal Forwarded by Jim ArmogidaCorpEnron on PM Emerson Michael AM To cc Subject Term Sheet ENRONTermSheetdoc

Bear Stears confirmsthe swap and termination confirms look fine to me The only question I would have for you in on the swap confirm On page there is a transfer provision at the bottom of the page I dont know what the transfer provision in Section of the Master Agreement is but I just want to be sure that this does not allow them to freely transfer their obligations under the agreement to a nonaffiliate I know that the trade has been terminated but I just dont want any bad precedents being set This language may be just fine I just wanted to be sure Otherwise it looks good to me CF

SWAP Termsterm sheet looks fine to me CF Forwarded by Clint FreelandCorpEnron on AM Aneela CT PM To Jeff CT Clint nron Jo CT cc Subject SWAP Terms To cc Maanavi Dariush CICGGEDNY Lyons Maureen CICGGELPNY Subject SWAP Terms ENETRRSwaplegaldoc ENEswapxls John Attached is a termsheet and execution summary for the ENE swap entered into today If we dont get to mm shares by Friday we are happy to tranche the swap based on the number of shares executed at that time Please give me a call if you have any questions or comments We will give you a call in the morning to discuss if you would like us to continue our hedging activity Thank you ENETRRSwaplegaldoc ENEswapxls

Procedure memo for equity trades I put together a first draft of a procedure memo for executing equity derivatives on Enron common stock Please review this and give me any comments you might have I would appreciate it if I could have comments back from you by Friday morning so that we can have a working document as soon as possible Thanks in advance for your help CF

Re Enron Corp derivatives tradinghave meetings at and today Otherwise Im available to meet CF From Sara CT on AM To Rex nron Jim NRON Clint nron Jeff CT cc Subject Enron Corp derivatives trading All Attached is a short recap of the items which I have been discussing with Clint and Jeff Id like to get together sometime today or tomorrow Rex and Jim I will fax to you copies of the Enron Corp resolutions some final some draft only referenced in the attached summary I may not have the latest information and perhaps you can update and address when we meet Please call me with a suggested time This afternoon is best for me

Update on Sterling PATs Cc Just a quick update on where we are with the Sterling PAT financing We got final word yesterday that Arthur Anderson would not give us the accounting treatment we needed for the transaction so we are currently looking at a couple of modifications to the structure that may address their concerns Ill keep you posted on our progress but at this point there is not much the team aside from me and the accountants needs to do CF

RE Assignment language Cc Thanks for the note and apologies for this dragging out as long as it has It is clearly our intention to transition the swap into a forward dated I believe August th in the very near future and would ask that Merrill Lynch hold on to all payments due to Enron until that time Either Sara Shackleton or I will call you tomorrow Regards CF Barna Peter CICG Equity Linked Capital Markets PM To cc Subject RE Assignment language Hey Clint I was talking to some folks in Trading and Risk Mgmt who are concerned that we are sitting on swap payments that technically should have been paid to you Can you send us a short letter notifying us of your intention to complete the transition to a forward and for us to hold onto the interest payments until such time Thanks and sorry for the inconvienience Original Message From SMTP Sent Tuesday October AM To Subject Assignment language Peter Sara is looking at the assignment language right now we got it yesterday Once she has reviewed it Ill forward it to you CF
